TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WizardStepBase extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.View
Public MustInherit Class WizardStepBase Inherits View
public ref class WizardStepBase abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::View

summary.span: 實作 控制項步驟中要求的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by a step in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法直接建立的執行個體類別。You cannot directly create an instance of the class. 相反地，此類別會繼承由類別和類別提供的步驟，以做為精靈的控制項中的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by the class and the class to provide the basic functionality of a step in a control that acts as a wizard. 您可以從衍生類別來建立自訂的類別，表示精靈控制項中的唯一步驟。You can derive from the class to create a custom class that represents a unique step in a wizard control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected WizardStepBase ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: WizardStepBase();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool AllowReturn { get; set; }
.property instance bool AllowReturn
Public Overridable Property AllowReturn As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AllowReturn { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許使用者從 集合的後續步驟返回目前步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a collection.

value.span: 如果允許使用者返回目前步驟，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user is allowed to return to the current step; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來強制執行線性瀏覽方式控制項。The property can be used to enforce linear navigation in a control. 如果每個步驟都有其屬性設定為`false`，使用者不能已存取之後，回到的步驟。If each step has its property set to `false`, the user will not be able to return to a step after it has been accessed. 您可以使用這項功能的其中一個案例是不允許使用者回到的步驟，因為您會將資料保存到資料庫，為每個步驟完成之後完成。One scenario where you might use this functionality is to disallow a user to return to a step after it has been completed because you are persisting the data to a database as each step is completed. 如果您將資料儲存在每個步驟之後，允許使用者返回步驟，變更後已儲存的資訊已儲存的資料可能會損毀。If you save the data after each step and allow the user to return to a step and change information after it has been saved, the saved data might become corrupted. 藉由設定屬性`false`，一旦使用者已離開步驟，他或她將無法返回並變更任何值。By setting the property to `false`, once the user has left a step, he or she will not be able to return to it and change any values. 屬性會決定如何及何時**上一步**不呈現 按鈕。The property determines how and when the **Previous** button is not rendered. 下表描述**上一步**按鈕呈現行為。The following table describes the **Previous** button rendering behavior. |情節Scenario|行為Behavior| |--------------|--------------| |線性： 步驟 1 已設`false`移至步驟 2 的使用者動作。Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 2.|步驟 2 不會顯示**上一步** 按鈕。Step 2 does not display the **Previous** button.| |非線性： 步驟 1 已設`false`移至步驟 3 的使用者動作。Non-Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 3.|步驟 3 不會顯示**上一步** 按鈕。Step 3 does not display the **Previous** button.| |提要欄位按鈕： 步驟 2 中有設`false`，設為`true`，使用者按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕。SideBar Buttons: Step 2 has set to `false` , is set to `true`, and a user clicks on the SideBar button.|[資訊看板] 會自動停用任何按鈕時設`false`。No buttons are automatically disabled on the sidebar when is set to `false`. 如果使用者按一下按鈕時，會忽略的動作。If a user clicks the button, the action is ignored.| |線性和非線性具有自訂範本： 此步驟中有自訂巡覽樣板。Linear & Non-Linear with Custom Template: The step has a custom navigation template.|沒有自動隱藏或顯示發生如果設`false`當您使用範本瀏覽。No automatic hiding or displaying occurs if is set to `false` when you use a template for navigation. **上一步**按鈕應該選用的範本。The **Previous** button should be optional on the template.| |使用 Visual Studio 設計工具和： 控制項有 5 個步驟，您在步驟 4，處理和執行網頁。Using the Visual Studio Designer and : The control has 5 steps, you are working on step 4, and you run the page.|步驟 4 時，然後在**上一步**按鈕會呈現。When step 4 is the , then the **Previous** button is rendered. **上一步**按鈕只隱藏的設歷程記錄中的上一個步驟時具有設`false`。The **Previous** button is only hidden for set to when the preceding step in the history has set to `false`. 步驟 4 會先轉譯並在歷程記錄中沒有任何步驟，因為**上一步**不隱藏按鈕。Since step 4 is rendered first and there are no steps in the history, the **Previous** button is not hidden.| |啟動步驟並非線性導覽： 使用者造訪步驟 3 和步驟 4 和步驟 1 已設。Start Step and Non-Linear Navigation: A user visits step 3 and step 4 and then step 1 which has set to .|精靈不會新增**上一步**按鈕時設不論使用者如何巡覽至該步驟。The wizard does not add a **Previous** button when the is set to regardless of how the user navigates to that step.| |歷程記錄中的相同步驟： 使用者造訪步驟 3 其中設和使用者不會認可它們的動作。Same Step In History: A user visits step 3 where is set to and the user does not commit their actions. 他們再按一下步驟 3 一步 按鈕。They then click on the previous button on step 3.|精靈控制項會檢查是否要**上一步**歷程記錄中的步驟是使用者目前是在 「 相同 」 步驟。The wizard control checks to see if the **Previous** step in the history is the "same" step that the user is currently on. 如果步驟相同，精靈控制項往回查看歷程記錄來判斷上述的 「 其他 」 步驟，與基底的顯示**上一步**按鈕和目的地取決於 「 不同逐步 」 記錄中。If the step is the same, the wizard control looks back in the history to determine the preceding "different" step and bases the display of the **Previous** button and destination based on the "different step" in the history.| > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為`false`，但父控制項的屬性設`true`，按一下 [資訊看板] 區域中的按鈕沒有任何作用。When the property is set to `false`, but the property of the parent control of is set to `true`, clicking on a button in the sidebar area has no effect. [資訊看板] 區域通常會顯示提供非線性導覽，所以如果您未使用的非線性導覽功能，您可能想要設定屬性`false`。The sidebar area is generally displayed to provide nonlinear navigation, so if you are not using the functionality of nonlinear navigation, you may want to set the property to `false`. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用停止中的步驟，將使用者屬性後已存取控制。The following example demonstrates using the property to stop the user from returning to a step in the control after it has been accessed. 在範例中，`Step1`步驟都有其屬性設定為`false`。In the example, the `Step1` step has its property set to `false`. 在使用者離開`Step1`步驟中，沒有上一步按鈕是否出現在`Step2`步驟。After the user leaves the `Step1` step, no Previous button appears on the `Step2` step. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/CS/wizardstepbaseallowreturncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/VB/wizardstepbaseallowreturnvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool EnableTheming { get; set; }
.property instance bool EnableTheming
Public Overrides Property EnableTheming As Boolean
public: virtual property bool EnableTheming { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出佈景主題是否套用至此控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供控制項。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 屬性也會影響是否啟用佈景主題的控制項集合中包含的控制項。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its controls collection. 當屬性是`true`，要套用的控制項面板會搜尋應用程式的佈景主題目錄。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果特定的控制項面板佈景主題目錄中，未套用面板。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 當屬性是`false`，不會搜尋主題目錄和值屬性不使用。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the value of the property is not used. 控制項可以覆寫值由其父控制項或包含網頁的設定。A control can override the value set by its parent control or by the containing page. 比方說，如果控制項有設`false`，您可以選擇性地將佈景主題套用至內含精靈步驟，藉由設定子控制項屬性`true`上個別子控制項。For example, if a control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the wizard step by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ID { get; set; }
.property instance string ID
Public Overrides Property ID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指派給伺服器控制項的程式設計識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the server control.

value.span: 指派給控制項的程式設計識別項。

span.span: The programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用識別，並參考中的 Web Form 網頁的特定精靈步驟控制項的屬性。Use the property to identify and reference a particular wizard step control in a Web Forms page. 值會變成網頁中的控制項執行個體的名稱; 這可讓您輕鬆地存取特定的步驟，在該頁面的程式碼。The value becomes the name of the control instance in the page; this allows you to easily access a particular step in code for that page. 例如，如果您設定屬性控制項至 「 步驟 1 」 中，您可以參考在該頁面的程式碼精靈步驟的子控制項`Step1.Controls`。For example, if you set the property of a control to "Step1", you can reference the child controls of the wizard step in code for that page as `Step1.Controls`. 控制項可確保每個步驟步驟是新增或修改設計階段時，控制項具有有效的唯一識別碼。The control ensures that each step in a control has a valid unique identifier when steps are added or modified at design time. 例如，當您設定步驟在執行階段中，它無法符合另一個步驟中所包含的識別項控制項，而且無法符合包含控制項。For example, when you set the for a step at design time, it cannot match the identifier for another step contained in the control, and it cannot match the for the containing control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義三個精靈的步驟Web Form 頁面中的控制項。The following code example defines three wizard steps for a control in a Web Forms page. 網頁的程式碼，在精靈的步驟執行個體命名為依識別碼值，並做為程式碼中參考這些`WizardStep1`， `WizardStep2`，和`WizardStep3`。In code for the page, the wizard step instances are named by their ID values, and they can be referenced in the code as `WizardStep1`, `WizardStep2`, and `WizardStep3`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/CS/wizardactivestepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/VB/wizardactivestepvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 該屬性在設計階段設為無效的識別項字串。

span.span: The property was set to an invalid identifier string at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 該屬性在設計階段設為與包含 控制項相同的識別項。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as the containing control at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 該屬性在設計階段設為與包含 控制項中的其他步驟相同的識別項。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as another step in the containing control at design time.

summary.span: 取得名稱，該名稱與做為精靈之控制項中的步驟相關聯。

span.span: Gets the name associated with a step in a control that acts as a wizard.

value.span: 與做為精靈之控制項中的步驟相關聯的名稱。

span.span: The name associated with a step in a control that acts as a wizard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回字串，識別精靈控制項中的步驟。The property returns a string that identifies a step in a wizard control. 如果指定的值屬性，屬性會傳回該值。If a value is specified for the property, the property returns that value. 如果未不指定任何值，如屬性，屬性傳回的值屬性。If no value is specified for the property, the property returns the value of the property. 如果未指定任何值或屬性，屬性會傳回`null`。If values are not specified for either the or the property, the property returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType StepType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType StepType
Public Overridable Property StepType As WizardStepType
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WizardStepType StepType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WizardStepType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WizardStepType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定巡覽使用者介面 (UI) 的類型，以顯示 控制項中的步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of navigation user interface (UI) to display for a step in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示的步驟中的導覽按鈕的型別控制項。Use the property to specify the type of navigation buttons to display for a step in a control. 如果您指定這個屬性的值，任何步驟標示為會顯示在 [資訊看板] 以停用狀態。If you specify a value for this property, any steps marked as displays in a disabled state in the sidebar. 如果您未指定此屬性的值，預設值是`WizardStepType.Auto`。If you do not specify a value for this property, the default is `WizardStepType.Auto`. 下表列出可用的設定屬性及步驟的產生的行為：The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step: `WizardStepType.Auto` 瀏覽步驟呈現 UI 是由宣告該步驟的順序決定。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 此步驟為最後一個出現，The step is the last one to appear. 不會呈現巡覽按鈕。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 此步驟是收集資料的最後一個步驟，The step is the final data collection step. 完成 5d; 和上一步 按鈕會呈現巡覽。The Finish and Previous buttons are rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 此步驟為第一個出現，The step is the first one to appear. 上一步按鈕不會呈現。A Previous button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 步驟是開始和完成步驟之間的任何步驟。The step is any step between the Start and the Finish step. 瀏覽呈現上一個 和 下一步 按鈕。Previous and Next buttons are rendered for navigation. 這種步驟類型有助於覆寫 步驟類型。This step type is useful for overriding the step type.

exception.span: 選取的值不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overridable Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定標題，以便在啟用提要欄位功能時，用於 控制項中的步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets the title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.

value.span: 標題，在啟用提要欄位功能時，用於 控制項步驟。

span.span: The title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來顯示使用者易記的標題中的步驟控制要啟用 [資訊看板] 功能時。Use the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled. 如果屬性未設定，並啟用 [資訊看板] 功能時，值屬性會顯示 [資訊看板] 按鈕。If the property is not set and the sidebar feature is enabled, the value of the property is displayed for the sidebar button. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示使用者易記的標題中的步驟控制項。The following example demonstrates using the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in the control. 在範例中，`Step1`並沒有其設定屬性，讓它出現在"WizardStep1"控制項。In the example, `Step1` does not have its property set, so it appears in the control as "WizardStep1". `Step2` 沒有其設定屬性，因此它會顯示為 「 步驟 2 」。`Step2` does have its property set, so it appears as "Step 2". [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/CS/wizardstepbasetitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/VB/wizardstepbasetitlevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項，它是從 衍生之物件的父項。

span.span: Gets the control that is the parent of the object derived from .

value.span: 控制項，是從 衍生之物件的父項。

span.span: The control that is the parent of the object derived from .
